basic.description: Designed to present a view of elementary schools where arts-based activities and environments form the focus for learning not only in the arts, but in other academic subjects as well. Topics include arts and cognition; how math, science, technology, personal and social studies, and language can be authentically incorporated in arts-based learning; how arts programs can induce change in schools; and the role of social learning and community knowledge.
basic.subject: FOCI
basic.title: Arts-Based Ed In Elem School
